title: Kecara JustCocoa Hands & Body butter - Unscented

0.alt: Kecara JustCocoa Hands & Body butter - Unscented

1.alt: Kecara JustCocoa Hands & Body butter - Unscented

description.main_description: Kecara is a family-owned business named for three sisters -- Kelly, Carine, and Raissa -- who have formulated a range of natural skin and body care products featuring African shea and cocoa butter, ingredients they have known and loved since childhood in Côte d'Ivoire. Free from artificial ingredients, Kecara products nourish dry skin and protect it from cold weather in ways that petroleum derived products simply can not. And, very importantly, Kecara’s products are made using only fair trade ingredients sourced directly from West African organic farming cooperatives.  Learn more about Kecara and the values that motivate their products at Kecara.com and https://www.instagram.com/kecaraboutique/ Kecara’s JustCocoa Hands & Body butter is made  with organic and fair trade ingredients -- cocoa butter, shea butter, coconut oil, and cold-pressed argan oil -- to instantly deliver deep moisture to your skin while it’s restorative abilities help repair, protect and nourish. Please note: this product is not nut-free as it contains shea butter.
description.Ingredients: organic  butyrospermum parkii (shea butter/beurre de karite),  organic t heobroma cacao (cocoa butter/beurre de cacao),  organic  cocos nucifera (coconut oil),  organic  argania spinosa (argan oil/huile d'argan)
description.Directions: Use daily and as often as needed, on the hands, as a body moisturizer, or on problem areas such as dry feet, cracked heels, or small cuts and burns. Discontinue use if irritation occurrs.
description.Format: Each plastic jar contains 120 ml / 4 fl oz of product

description.main_description: Just the Goods chooses to offer The Green Beaver Company's fomaing hand soap because it is plant-based, vegan, certified cruelty-free, labelled with ingredient transparency in mind, independently owned, affordable, gender inclusive, and makes no gimmicky claims. All products are ECOCERT Greenlife certified, certified vegan and cruelty-free by PETA, and The Green Beaver Company has taken Environmental Defence's Just Beautiful pledge. From The Green Beaver Company's website: The lavender you love with the rosemary you won't get enough of!  If you know Green Beaver, you must also know that we're big on lavender! That's because its calming and unique aroma turns a mundane task like washing your hands into a relaxing experience! Now with a hint of Rosemary to give it a distinct twist, and Labrador tea working hard to nourish and soften your skin, take the time to appreciate the little things as you go on about in your day! Available in 250 ml / 8.4 fl oz pump bottles -or- 770 ml / 26 fl oz refill bottles  Sample sizes of this item are, unfortunately, not produced by the manufacturer, The Green Beaver Company. F or hygienic reasons, please note that purchases of this item are considered final sale.

title: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial cleaning gel for dry skin

0.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial cleaning gel for dry skin

1.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial cleaning gel for dry skin

description.main_description: Responding to the needs of folks with chronically dry skin that tends toward sensitivity, or experiences stress from managing the impact of - for example - an arid climate, Just the Goods has developed a light cleansing gel that balances the need for both surface cleansing and moisutre retention.  And yes, sometimes and oil cleansing method just feels nice, too! This product can be used alone, or before the gentle exfoliation offered via petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods' cleansing grains for dry skin. In either case, it is recommended that this product be followed with cleansing toner for best results.  This light gel features the following ingredients:  Organic, unrefined coconut oil -- while not recommended as a leave-on facial moisturizer -- contains a variety of medium-chain fatty acids with antibacterial and antifungal properties that help to break down sebum, dirt, and makeup on the surface of the skin without causing irritation.  Castor oil is a humectant rich in triglycerides to help skin retain moisture while also stimulating new tissue growth Jojoba oil is uniquely like our own skin's sebum, so it is remarkably effective at penetrating deeply to both deliver necessary moisture and control excess oil in every skin type. It also contains essential fatty acids such as omega-6 and -9, rich antioxidants, and nourishing vitamins A, D, and E, all of which combine to soothe, protect, and repair cellular damage. Geranium essential oil offering antiseptic, antifungal, and antibacterial properties help to normalize sebum secretion and prevent acne. As an anti-inflammatory, it promotes blood circulation ensuring best possible nourishment to cells, which contributes to hydration and minimizes incidences of eczema and rosacea. Rich in antioxidants, it promotes skin’s natural ability to ward off free radicals and harmful UV rays. It's gentle astringent effect helps to cleanse and tighten pores.  Bisabolol is the active compound in chamomile, which makes it anti-irritant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial -- all beneficial for gentle cleansing while also soothing and softening dry and/or easily irritated skin. This product is also suitable for daily use by those with normal/sensitive skin and suitable for occassional use by those with oily skin. This cleanser can remove both mineral and petroleum-based makeup. For best results, remove product from face with a washcloth well saturated with warm water, then  -- as mentioned above -- follow with an appropriate toner applied with a cotton pad to reach into pores for a complete finish.  Find JTG’s tips for daily skin care, including how to most effectively use toner, here: https://justthegoods.net/pages/tips-for-daily-skin-care. Each glass jar contains 100 g / 3.52 oz. This product contains ingredients considered safe for use during most pregnancies and nursing. Still, it is best to check with your health care providers first in case of any unique circumstances which may demonstrate otherwise. All petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods products are… made with 100% certified organic plant and mineral-based ingredients  vegan and certified cruelty-free by the Leaping Bunny Program  free from artificial preservatives, colours, and/or fragrances  free from gluten, GMOs, nuts, palm, petrochemicals, and soy offered in glass bottles/jars and packed in boxes printed on post-consumer paper with plant-based inks using a waterless process This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives and lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses for maximum longevity. NOTE: Not sure if this product is right for you? Try a sample first by selecting the smaller packaging option using the drop down menu
description.Ingredients: cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, ricinus communis (castor) oil*, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, pelargonium graveolens (geranium bourbon) oil*, matricaria chamomilla (german chamomile) oil*, eugenol•, geraniol•, linalool•, citronellol• *organic  •component of essential oil   huile de cocos nucifera (noix de coco)*, huile de ricinus communis (ricin)*, huile de graines de simmondsia chinensis (jojoba)*, huile de pélargonium graveolens (géranium bourbon)*, huile de matricaria camomilla (camomille allemande), eugénol•, géraniol•, linalol•, citronellol•  * biologique   • composant d'huile essentielle
description.Directions: Massage a small amount of product onto face in circular motions avoiding the eyes; rinse well with warm water and a washcloth; pat dry with a towel and follow with toner for best results. Store in a cool, dark place (i.e. a refrigerator will maintain firm texture if desired). Use within 8 months of opening.  Masser une petite quantité de gel sur le visage en mouvements circulaires en évitant les yeux. Bien rincer avec de l'eau tiède et une débarbouillette, sécher en tapotant avec une serviette puis appliquer un tonique pour de meilleurs résultats. Ranger dans un endroit frais et sombre (un réfrigérateur maintiendra la texture ferme si désiré). Utiliser dans les 8 mois suivant l'ouverture.

Rose is also high in vitamin C, an antioxidant that helps prevent cellular damage Aloe is comprised of antioxidants, beneficial enzymes, vitamins A and C, and aloin making it antimicrobial and an effective anti-inflammatory that also promotes the production of hyaluronic acid, collagen, and elastin to help skin maintain elasticity and firmness. It’s humectant properties help skin retain moisture Rose geranium essential oil offers antiseptic, antifungal, and antibacterial properties help to normalize sebum secretion. Rich in antioxidants, it promotes skin’s natural ability to ward off free radicals and harmful UV rays. It's gentle astringent effect on skin helps cleanse and tighten pores. title: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial serum for dry skin

0.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial serum for dry skin

1.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial serum for dry skin

description.main_description: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods’ facial serum for dry skin combines fast absorbing oils to hydrate without residue while also delivering a rich variety of vitamins, essential fatty acids, and antioxidants to replenish and tone skin for soft texture and a healthy glow. Rosehip seed oil is harvested from the seeds of rose bushes and is full of antioxidants vitamins A and C, and omega-6 essential fatty acids, which nourish cells deeply to protect, repair, hydrate, and promote healthy cellular turnover thanks to boosted production of collagen and elastin. Chia seed oil is noted for being a rich botanical source of essential fatty acids that are powerfully anti-inflammatory to reduce, prevent, and treat itchy, dry skin even when associated with internal medical conditions, as opposed to the sorts of dryness triggered by living in an arid climate. And, in the course of fighting irritation and dehydration, chia seed oil can help to promote a clear complexion, as well. The gamma-linoleic acid among other nutrients found in evening primrose oil are essential for retaining cell structure and promoting the elasticity of skin. This and other fatty acids are anti-inflammatory in nature, which helps to reduce redness and irritation to prevent incidences of eczema and/or psoriasis. Being so highly moisturizing, evening primrose oil reduces dryness by encouraging healthy regeneration of skin cells for softer feeling skin Castor oil is a humectant rich in triglycerides to help skin retain moisture while also stimulating new tissue growth Neroli essential oil softens skin as mildly antibacterial properties help to clear pores while imparting moisture. And, since stress causes spikes in cortisol levels which can lead to breakouts due to hormonal imbalance (i.e. acne, psoriasis, eczema, etc), neroli’s aromatherapeutic value benefits the nervous system to reduce anxiety, and ultimately benefit skin health, as well. Helichrysum is very hydrating and is known to reduce the appearance of scars by promoting cellular turnover. In this way it may also help to reduce the impacts of UV damage. A little goes a long way! Experiment by adding only a few drops to the face, and adding as desired. Take an opportunity to deeply inhale the serum before applying to experience maximum aromatherapeutic benefit. Each glass dropper bottle contains 30 ml / 1.01 fl oz ----- not 25 ml as indicated on the box and label due to a typo <=-)  This product contains ingredients considered safe for use during most pregnancies and nursing. Still, it is best to check with your health care providers first in case of any unique circumstances which may demonstrate otherwise. description.main_description: The benefits of carefully blended face masks are well known -- they help to remove accumulated impurities from pores while imparting valuable minerals and other nutrients. petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods offers a mask for dry skin made with plant-based ingredients (no mineral clays) that supports gentle cleansing while providing protection against irritation and dryness. For best results, apply with a brush as described in the directions below.  The benefits of each ingredient are as follows: Marshmallow root features mucilage, polysaccharides, and low concentrations of ceramide precursors to soothe, moisturize, and heal skin The anti-inflammatory properties of rose petals replenish skin, helping it feel soft by reducing redness and/or swelling while its mild antibacterial action helps to cleanse and tone pores. Rose is also high in vitamin C, an antioxidant that helps prevent cellular damage. Aloe is comprised of antioxidants vitamins A and C, beneficial enzymes, and aloin making it antimicrobial and an effective anti-inflammatory that also promotes the production of hyaluronic acid, collagen, and elastin to help skin maintain elasticity and firmness. It’s humectant properties help skin retain moisture Nutrient rich alfalfa offers proteins, minerals, vitamins, and antioxidants, all of which combine to combat the effects of pollutants and irritants on skin by promoting soothing, healing, and cellular regeneration. It’s high levels of chlorophyll provide antibacterial cleansing Ashwagandha root powder features both antibacterial and antimicrobial properties to help protect skin from infections, while it’s antioxidant properties defend against free radicals, and it’s anti-inflammatory capacity soothes. Most interestingly, ashwagandha stimulates dehydroepiandrosterone, which stimulates the production of elastin, collagen, and hyaluronan for skin cells that are supple, strong, and well hydrated Masks are best used after the face has been well cleaned; follow a mask with with toner to remove any residue that may be left behind after rinsing. title: Looking for eye cream? Please read this product description for details 🙂

0.alt: Looking for eye cream? Please read this product description for details 🙂

description.main_description: After extensive research, I've concluded that conventional products marketed as eye cream take advantage of misinformation about what skin really needs by offering formulas that contain little more than petrochemicals designed to feel light and absorb quickly, which are then packaged into smaller containers and sold at a higher price.  Over the past 10 years, clients worldwide have expressed satisfaction using my facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin around the delicate eye area because it is made from nutritive, non-toxic, plant based ingredients and does not contain any essential oils which might cause eyes to water or burn. Some people feel comfortable using JTG's facial moisturizer for dry skin under more extreme conditions (i.e. very arid climates, or while managing specific skin or overall conditions). Please note, however, that I *never* recommend Just the Goods facial moisturizers for oily/combination skin or acne prone skin be used around the eyes because they contain essential oils that are inappropriate for use near the eyes.  Those with oily/combination skin or acne prone skin who purchase full-sized bottles of facial moisturizer for their needs opt to purchase a small/sample sized bottle of facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin to be used exclusively as eye cream.  If - at some point in the future - I decided to create a wholly new formula that genuinely serves people in a better way as an exclusively single function product, you can trust that I'll be completely transparent about it and *not* take advantage of the marketplace collusion that imagines tiny jars as overpriced miracles ;-) This product can be found in the listing for Just the Goods facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin, but I'm offering it here as its own listing to help folks find this information more quickly/easily. *** Please note that this item ships as a 1 oz bottle of facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin, which is exactly what it is (as described above). I have not created new/different labels. Your will not receive a 1 oz bottle that has a label for "eye cream". *** Ingredient highlights: Avocado oil is rich in vitamins A, D and E, as well as potassium, proteins, beta-carotene and numerous essential unsaturated fatty acids. It also contains a high quantity of sterolins, which is reported to help reduce age spots, help heal sun damage and scars. Avocado oil is furthermore said to increase the amount of collagen in the skin, which facilitates regeneration, particularly in the case of skin that is dehydrated or otherwise affected by difficult climates (i.e. Winnipeg’s dry winters). Some claim that avocado oil can even help to relieve the dryness and itching of psoriasis and eczema. Apricot kernel oil has a high content of vitamins A, C, and E, as well as fatty acids such as oleic and linoleic acid. It is considered gentle enough to be used in products for babies, and is thus also suitable for mature and sensitive skin. It is well absorbed without leaving a greasy feeling, and can be helpful in calming the discomfort associated with conditions such as eczema and dermatitis. Aloe vera gel is a powerful moisturizer that simultaneously helps to remove dead skin. It also stimulates the synthesis of collagen and elastin and is known to have a healing effect on burns and other wounds, all of which translates into assisting regeneration. This handcrafted product is made without artificial preservatives. To protect it's integrity and to promote longevity, please store this product in a cool dark place and seal tightly between uses as heat and sunlight will cause premature deterioration.
description.Format: This product -- facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin that doubles as eye cream -- is offered in 25 ml/1 oz hdpe bottles. Please note that the stock image shows a larger format of the same product (118 ml / 4 oz). A new photo of a smaller bottle will be uploaded when it becomes available. There is no product with a label stating "eye cream". Thanks!
description.Note: This item is made with the the same formula that also serves as: tattoo aftercare, after sun lotion, hair smoothing lotion, and as a general hand/body lotion idea for managing mild cases of eczema (unscented lotion with apricot kernel and avocado oil). These items are bottled with different names to better serve those looking for specific items. Customer feedback has also indicated that it helps to avoid confusion with the facial moisturizers for other skin types which contain ingredients unsuitable for other purposes  Facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin, however, can be used as an eye cream and is being offered as such.

description.main_description: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods’ facial serum for normal/sensitive skin combines fast absorbing oils to hydrate without residue while also delivering a rich variety of vitamins, essential fatty acids, and antioxidants to replenish and tone skin for soft texture and a healthy glow.  This product contains plant-based ingredients that cleanse, nourish, and balance naturally oily skin; it does not contain any synthetic mattifying ingredients. Jojoba oil is uniquely like our own skin's sebum, so it is remarkably effective at penetrating deeply to both deliver necessary moisture and control excess oil in every skin type. It also contains essential fatty acids such as omega-6 and -9, rich antioxidants, and nourishing vitamins A, D, and E, all of which combine to soothe, protect, and repair cellular damage. Rosehip seed oil is harvested from the seeds of rose bushes and is full of vitamins A and C, antioxidants, and omega-6 essential fatty acids, which nourish cells deeply to protect, repair, hydrate, and promote healthy cellular turnover thanks to boosted production of collagen and elastin.  Evening Primrose Oil contains a high concentration of a fatty acid called gamma-linolenic acid, which has been shown to reduce clogged pores by dissolving sebum and other impurities. The fatty acids in evening primrose oil are anti-inflammatory in nature, which helps to reduce redness and irritation.  A powerful, stimulating skin cleanser, niaouli is a more gentle version of tea tree oil with both antiseptic and antibacterial properties that can help to manage skin irritations and keep skin clear. It’s cicatrisant and vulnerary properties help to speed healing by encouraging new tissue growth, ultimately contributing to a smoother complexion via diminishing the appearance of scars from past acne, etc.  Neroli essential oil softens skin as mildly antibacterial properties help to clear pores while imparting moisture. And, since stress causes spikes in cortisol levels which can lead to breakouts due to hormonal imbalance (i.e. acne, psoriasis, eczema, etc), neroli’s aromatherapeutic value benefits the nervous system to reduce anxiety, and ultimately benefit skin health, as well. One of the world's most powerful astringents, yarrow can strengthen skin tone, balance sebum production, and reduce enlarged pores. And, thanks to its well balanced antiseptic, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, and emollient properties, it is furthermore known to treat and soothe infections, rashe and reducing redness.  A little goes a long way! Experiment by adding only a few drops to the face, and adding as desired. Take an opportunity to deeply inhale the serum before applying to experience maximum aromatherapeutic benefit. Parsley helps balance sebum production while also providing antibacterial and anti-fungal protection, making it helpful for treating acne among other minor skin infections. title: Chaga Concentrated Mushroom Powder by Harmonic Arts

0.alt: Chaga Concentrated Mushroom Powder by Harmonic Arts

1.alt: Chaga Concentrated Mushroom Powder by Harmonic Arts

description.main_description: I've been experimenting with mushroom powders in skin care, and now you can, too! This product is extracted from the fruiting body of Chaga mushroom using both hot water and alcohol making it very soluble and thus readily available for absorption by skin. Chaga mushroom shows up as a sclerotia (concentrated growth) that is found mostly on birch trees in the northern regions of our planet. It has been used for at least several hundred years in Russia and Eastern Europe and is well known and used extensively by indigenous people of northern Canada, Europe and Siberia. As a superfood and medicine Chaga has gained much popularity over the last 10 years, mostly due to its heavily researched potential anti-tumor and immuno-modulating properties. Chaga is also employed as a potent antioxidant for which it is starting to get quite a reputation. Indeed, it is these antioxidants (primarily polyphenols, which are components of melanin and hispidin analogs, and superoxide dismutase and catalase) that help to reduce cellular damage while improving elasticity and potentially minimizing the effects of scarring. Naturally occurring betulonic acid and zinc help to regenerate skin cells to facilitate healing. And, it's anti-inflammatory properties are especially beneficial to skin prone to swelling and/or redness. All in all, a fantastic ingredient to help protect skin. This dual extracted powder blends easily with water for use as a mask. Use it alone or blended with a light clay to help draw impurities away from the skin. Please note: This product is offered for use in facial care. For use as a dietary supplement, please consult your health care provider for information specific to your individual needs, including suitability for internal use during pregnancy/nursing.
description.Ingredients: Chaga (  Inonotus obliquus  ) extracted in alcohol and hot water. 9:1  4.5g/dose 30% polysaccharides  Fruiting Body Only
description.Format: **Formerly named Dual Extracted Mushroom  45 g packed in an amber glass bottle. Once opened, this product is final sale.
description.Sourcing: Sustainably cultivated on living birch trees in an organic-certified Siberian forest. This ensures a high concentration of betulinic acid and triterpenes.

Jojoba oil is uniquely like our own skin's sebum, so it is remarkably effective at penetrating deeply to both deliver necessary moisture and control excess oil in every skin type. It also contains essential fatty acids such as omega-6 and -9, rich antioxidants, and nourishing vitamins A, D, and E, all of which combine to soothe, protect, and repair cellular damage. Rosehip seed oil is harvested from the seeds of rose bushes and is full of vitamins A and C, antioxidants, and omega-6 essential fatty acids, which nourish cells deeply to protect, repair, hydrate, and promote healthy cellular turnover thanks to boosted production of collagen and elastin.  Rich in palmistic and omega-6 Linoleic fatty acids (among others), as well as cell protecting polyphenol antioxidants, camellia seed oil not only nourishes skin to promote elasticity, but calms inflammation as it delivers non-greasy smoothing moisture without residue  Neroli essential oil softens skin as mildly antibacterial properties help to clear pores while imparting moisture. title: Just the Goods facial steam for oily/congested skin

description.main_description: For those with oily and easily congested skin -- a type prone to blackheads, impacted sebaceous glands/sebaceous cysts, and acne -- the value of a nutritive facial steam to open and gently cleanse pores can not be overstated. Used after washing, it can help to make toner more effective; used before a face mask, it can help clay reach deeper to pull out unwanted elements such as bacteria, sebum, sweat, and makeup. Facial steaming can also prolong the the duration of a mask making it possible to derive maximum benefit.  Soothing, aromatherapy is also a positive benefit turning home skin care into a spa-like experience.  organic parsley helps balance sebum production while also providing antibacterial and anti-fungal protection, making it helpful for treating acne among other minor skin infections. It is also high in antioxidants, which can help reduce the amount of free radicals which can be responsible for skin damage. High in Vitamin C, parsley helps to stimulate collagen production and ultimately the renewal of skin cells overall.  Organic lavender offers anti-inflammatory and antiseptic properties that can reduce incidences of acne and inflammation. Lavender features antioxidants that can temper the effects of pollutants on skin by boosting the renewal process. And, by adding moisture, it can help to relieve itching as well as reduce the symptoms associated with excessive dryness such as eczema.  Juniper berries, like parsley, can help balance sebum production, which contributes to clear, matte skin. High in flavonoids and antioxidants, it can to resist damage to skin by free radicals. And, in dried berry form, not a concentrated essential oil, it offers mild antibacterial and antimicrobial support for skin while also offering uplifting aromatherapeutic benefits.  This product is not recommended for sensitive skin. This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.

title: Just the Goods vegan face mask for oily/congested skin

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan face mask for oily/congested skin - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Did you know that the most common skin type in the world is oily? That's right! So, in a sense, it should actually be the skin type known as "normal", *lol* While it is the most common, it can also be the most frustrating to maintain because excess sebum production in skin can contribute to clogged pores, which in turn leads to blackheads, impacted sebaceous glands/sebaceous cysts, and acne. This mask is designed to help; weekly use is recommended. Licorice root powder contains licochalcone, which helps to regulate the skin's oil production to calm over-active glands. It also contains glycyrrhizin, a helpful anti-inflammatory, and glabridin, which is believed to benefit the connective tissue of skin. High in antioxidants, liquorice can fight skin-damaging free radicals. Well blended with clay, the licorice scent is barely noticeable when dry, and only very faintly when wet. So, if you're not a fan of licorice flavour, feel confident that this is not the same. Samples in limited availability made from batch ends are available to try; select them using the drop down menu.  Australian olive green clay, packed with a wide array of minerals, is the strongest of all clays used in facial care restoring balance to acne-prone and oily skin through the absorption of dirt and oil. Some say it is revitalizing enough to help reduce the appearance of scars.  Kaolin is a mild yet effective clay suitable for all skin types selected for its ability to absorb accumulated oil and dirt from pores without over-drying and has been included to mediate the green clay.  This product is best suited for oily and congested skin types. This product is not recommended for sensitive skin.  This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.
description.Ingredients: kaolin clay/argile de kaolin, glycyrrhiza glabra (licorice/ réglisse ) root powder, australian olive green clay/ argile vert olive australien
description.Directions: After washing face thoroughly, mix approximately ½ tbsp of face mask with liquid of choice (i.e. water, aloe vera gel juice, rose water, cool green tea, etc.) to form a light paste; apply to face in upward strokes avoiding the eyes, nostrils, and lips. As the clay in this mask tends to dry quickly, the mask can be steamed for 5 - 8 minutes to prolong wear; rise well (rubbing in a circular motion to exfoliate if desired), apply toner and apply moisturizer as desired.

There is usually no estimated date on when samples will be back in stock -- more will be made as soon as a new batch of full-sized masks are required/made-to-order.  The sample bags are made out of biodegradable glassine paper.

description.main_description: Originally a limited edition item offered based on the availability of organic lavender harvested from my garden, this product is now produced year 'round using organic lavender supplied by WestPoint Naturals! Celebrating the height of summer, this limited edition facial mask typically features two of my favourite things: vibrant matcha and aromatic lavender. Kaolin is a mild yet effective clay suitable for all skin types selected for its ability to absorb accumulated oil and dirt from pores without over-drying. Organic AOI matcha is prized as a high quality beverage -- applied to skin, it promotes cellular regeneration and decreases sebum production making it beneficial to all skin types, particularly when weather is hot and humid. Lavender also stimulates cellular regeneration while offering mild antibacterial support that leaves skin feeling fresh and clean. Jasmine is softening, mildly exfoliating, and promotes radiance, which is useful for all skin types, but especially great any time skin feels dull or dry and needs a boost. This product is suitable for most skin types. It contains no essential oils, but does include a large quantity of recently ground lavender and jasmine petals, so it is fragrant and thus potentially not suitable for those allergic to botanical ingredients. This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.

description.main_description: Nippon Kodo's devotion to making fine incense follows a long and honored tradition that started more than 400 years ago and can be traced back to Jyuemon Takai, better known as Koju, a skilled artisan in the art and the principal provider of precious rare and exquisite aromas to the Emperor of Japan and his Court. Herb & Earth is made by Nippon Kodo featuring a bamboo stick that assures less smoke allowing you to smell more of the pure scent.
description.Format: Number of sticks per pack: 20 Burn Time approx. 30 min W x H x D (inch) 2 3/16 X 11 5/8 X 1/8 W x H x D (mm) 55 X 296 X 3
description.Company history: Nippon Kodo's devotion to making fine incense follows a long and honored tradition that started more than 400 years ago and can be traced back to Jyuemon Takai, better known as Koju, a skilled artisan in the art and the principal provider of precious rare and exquisite aromas to the Emperor of Japan and his Court. Many of those pleasing and enduring high-quality incense fragrances, which the company continues to produce to this day, are based on the original formulas created by Koju and later by Yujiro Kito, who was hailed as the genius of fragrance during the Meiji restoration period in the 19th century - around the time that Japan opened its doors to the world and began to modernize itself.  Brought to Japan in the eighth century by Buddhist monks, who used the mystical aromas in their religious ceremonies, "Koh", as incense is called in Japanese, passed into the realm of the aristocracy centuries later as a source of amusement and enlightenment as they "listened to the fragrance" in their parlor games. It wasn't until the 14th century in the Muromachi Era that incense reached the height of its popularity with the upper and middle classes of Japanese society, who used it as a mark of distinction and sophistication and to dispel unpleasant odors. It was around this time that samurai warriors began perfuming their helmets and armor with incense before going into battle as they prepared to meet their fate.  Now, incense promises to become even more acceptable and desirable as a new dimension in gracious living that opens up a whole new world of spiritual awareness and understanding. As such, Nippon Kodo's mission is to serve the very best that the world of incense has to offer while at the same time expanding the breadth of incense knowledge through enlightening information dissemination.   Their 5 commitments to quality include:      closely guarded incense-making skills  the skills of incense craftspeople  carefully selected materials  passing on incense culture  the highest level of safety (Nippon Kodo sets the highest saftey standards in the world of incense making by using standardized measurement technology from Denmark that collects constituents in the air after incense is burned for quality control analysis)    Learn more by visiting: http://www.nipponkodostore.com/

Many of those pleasing and enduring high-quality incense fragrances, which the company continues to produce to this day, are based on the original formulas created by Koju and later by Yujiro Kito, who was hailed as the genius of fragrance during the Meiji restoration period in the 19th century - around the time that Japan opened its doors to the world and began to modernize itself.  Brought to Japan in the eighth century by Buddhist monks, who used the mystical aromas in their religious ceremonies, "Koh", as incense is called in Japanese, passed into the realm of the aristocracy centuries later as a source of amusement and enlightenment as they "listened to the fragrance" in their parlor games. It wasn't until the 14th century in the Muromachi Era that incense reached the height of its popularity with the upper and middle classes of Japanese society, who used it as a mark of distinction and sophistication and to dispel unpleasant odors. It was around this time that samurai warriors began perfuming their helmets and armor with incense before going into battle as they prepared to meet their fate.  Now, incense promises to become even more acceptable and desirable as a new dimension in gracious living that opens up a whole new world of spiritual awareness and understanding. As such, Nippon Kodo's mission is to serve the very best that the world of incense has to offer while at the same time expanding the breadth of incense knowledge through enlightening information dissemination.   Their 5 commitments to quality include:      closely guarded incense-making skills  the skills of incense craftspeople  carefully selected materials  passing on incense culture  the highest level of safety (Nippon Kodo sets the highest saftey standards in the world of incense making by using standardized measurement technology from Denmark that collects constituents in the air after incense is burned for quality control analysis)    Learn more by visiting: http://www.nipponkodostore.com/

title: Omega Synthetic Vegan Shaving Brush with Beech Wood Handle

0.alt: Omega Synthetic Vegan Shaving Brush with Beech Wood Handle - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Just the Goods is proud to offer a cruelty-free shaving brush that is both affordable and sturdy enough to last a lifetime. These synthetic bristles, more like boar in appearance and function, represent the next generation of synthetic technology. Omega brushes made in Italy are world renowned for quality and shaving with one is a true pleasure! This brush features as a beech wood handle offering a pleasant weight and timeless aesthetic.  To use, saturate bristles in warm water then press onto a Just the Goods shaving solid with rigorous circular motions. Don’t be afraid to press hard and really get in there! Remember, there is no artificial foaming agent added to our shaving solids, so the only way to get the tiny bubbles you need is to work them up with good ol’ fashioned friction. Once you’ve created bubbles, apply them by scooping them onto the bristles of the brush onto the to the area you’d like to shave. Remember, you don’t need too much – a little goes a long way. When you’re finished, rinse your brush with warm water, then lean or stand it upside down so the excess water runs out — this will help your brush last longer by preventing water from breaking down the adhesive holding the bristles in place. If you like, you can drill a hole through the handle of your brush to string a cord so you can hang it upside down until you’re ready to use it again. Model: OMEGA S-BRUSH S10005 Knot diameter: 25 mm Bristle loft: 54 mm Handle height: 56 mm Made in Italy

title: The Green Beaver Company Unscented Castile Soap

0.alt: The Green Beaver Company Unscented Castile Soap

description.main_description: Just the Goods chooses to offer The Green Beaver Company's Castile soap because it is plant-based, vegan, certified cruelty-free, labelled with ingredient transparency in mind, independently owned, affordable, gender inclusive, and makes no gimmicky claims. All products are Eco-Cert certified, certified vegan and cruelty-free by PETA, and The Green Beaver Company has taken Environmental Defence's Just Beautiful pledge. From The Green Beaver Company's website: This product is a multi-purpose soap is made with cold-pressed Canadian organic sunflower seed oil, harvested in Quebec. Not only does it support Canadian organic farmers, but it also enriches your skin with antioxidants such as vitamin E and carotenoids, and moisturizing omegas. Always soaping up a generous lather, The Green Beaver Company's Castile line is blended with coconut oil to leave your skin feeling fresh and soft – all while being gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. This soap is also biodegradable so it can be safely used when washing in lakes and rivers. Each bottle is 990 ml / 33.4 fl oz Sample sizes of this item are, unfortunately, not produced by the manufacturer, The Green Beaver Company. F or hygienic reasons, please note that purchases of this item are considered final sale.
description.Ingredients: Water, Potasium Cocoate** (saponified organic coconut oil), Potassium Sunflowerate** (saponified organic sunflower oil), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*  *Ingredients from organic farming ** Made using organic ingredients   100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin  28.7% of the total ingredients are from organic farming
description.Directions: The Green Beaver's liquid Castile soaps are concentrated. You may want to use full strength or dilute it with water depending on your usage. For example:    Body Wash : Use a couple of drops directly on a cloth or fill a bottle with 2 parts soap and 1 part water.   Hand Soap Dispenser : Refill your dispenser with 1 part soap and 3 parts water.   Veggie Wash : Add 1 tablespoon castile soap to 2 cups of water, and spray on your fruits and veggies.   Dish Soap : Simply squirt half of what you would normally use with conventional dish soap directly into the sink. Floor Cleanser: Use 2 or 3 tablespoons of soap in a full bucket of water and mop your floors to a sparkly new lustre.   Tile, Tub or Stovetop Scrub : Fill a spray bottle with 1 part soap and 3 parts water. Sprinkling a liberal dusting of baking soda to the area you wish to clean then spray the soap solution over the top. Scrub away !   Laundry detergent : Re-use an old laundry soap container and fill it with 2 Litres of hot water, ½ cup of soap, 1/3 cup of baking soda and 1/3 cup of coarse salt. Use ½ to 1 cup per load depending on the level of desired strength you need.

title: The Green Beaver Company Sensitive Toothpaste

0.alt: The Green Beaver Company Sensitive Toothpaste - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Yes! Just the Goods offers vegan toothpaste and its quite popular. However, I realize that the packaging is not ideal for everyone. Since I don't have a high pressure filling machine, I had to pull the bottle and pump format and now only make it available in glass jars. For those who prefer toothpaste in a tube, I'm happy to offer toothpaste by The Green Beaver Company because it meets my strict criteria as being: plant-based, vegan, certified cruelty-free, labelled with ingredient transparency in mind, independently owned, affordable, open to all genders, and sold without gimmicky claims. In fact, this is the brand of toothpaste I used back before Just the Goods was ever part of my imagination :) Their products are certified vegan and cruelty-free by PETA and I'm happy to say that The Green Beaver Company has also taken Environmental Defence's Just Beautiful pledge. From The Green Beaver Company's website: "Proven efficacy with natural potassium nitrate, this gentle toothpaste keeps your breath fresh, while helping to reduce and build protection against painful sensitivity of the teeth to cold, heat, acids, sweets, or contact. Shields dental nerves for lasting sensitivity relief when used regularly. Made with all-natural ingredients." Each tube is 75 ml / 2.5 fl oz. Sample sizes of this item are, unfortunately, not produced by the manufacturer, The Green Beaver Company. F or hygienic reasons, please note that purchases of this item are considered final sale.  Ingredients:  Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Aqua, Glycerin, Hydrate Silica, Xylitol, Coco-glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Menthol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate.

title: The Green Beaver Company Tea Tree Invigorating Conditioner

0.alt: The Green Beaver Company Tea Tree Invigorating Conditioner

description.main_description: Just the Goods has searched long and hard to find a healthier shampoo option that leaves hair feeling much like it does when using conventional products. But I had other strict criteria in mind, too. The brand needed to be: plant-based, vegan, certified cruelty-free, labelled with ingredient transparency in mind, independently owned, affordable, open to all genders, and it furthermore needed to *not* make gimmicky claims. Narrowing down beyond that, I purchased and tried oh-so-many products, but I was thrilled to discover something that was only one province away... The Green Beaver Company, based in Hawkesbury, Ontario! All products are Eco-Cert certified, certified vegan and cruelty-free by PETA and The Green Beaver Company has taken Environmental Defence's Just Beautiful pledge. From The Green Beaver Company's website: "Moisturize and heal your hair, with our brand new Tea Tree Invigorating Conditioner! Known for it’s healing and anti-septic properties, tea tree will gently provide an astringent and invigorating effect while soothing the scalp. Formulated for those with a sensitive to oily scalp, this conditioner is gentle enough for everyday use to naturally heal and moisturize hair from within. For best results, use with Tea Tree Invigorating Shampoo." Each bottle is 240 ml. Sample sizes of this item are, unfortunately, not produced by the manufacturer, The Green Beaver Company. F or hygienic reasons, please note that purchases of this item are considered final sale.  Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Aqua, Brassicyl Isoleucinate Esylate, Brassica Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera Oil*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sunflower Seed Oil Polyglyceryl-6 Esters, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil*, Mentha Piperita (Perppermint) Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Oil*, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Ester, Jojoba Ester, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Inulin, Borage Oil*, Achillea Millefolium Extract*, Sodium PCA, Ledum Groenlandicum Water*, Comptonia Peregrina Water*, Sodium Levulinate, Potassium Sorbate. Biodegradeable, gluten-free, certified cruelty free by PETA, gmo-free and vegan. Beyond this, this product is free from alcohol, artifical fragrance, parabens, phenoxyethanol, phthalates or dyes, SLS or other synthetic detergents, soy, triclosan * Ingredients from organic farming 44.64% of the total ingredients are from natural origin. 99.7% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. title: Ground Soap - Boldly Humble

0.alt: Ground Soap - Boldly Humble - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

1.alt: Ground Soap - Boldly Humble - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Ground Soap -- based in Cornwall (Ontario) -- is dedicated to creating unique hand made bars of soap using only organic and wild crafted ingredients. Ground Soap's goal is to provide people with products that are both healthy for body and mind and leave as small a footprint on our planet as possible. The "Ground" in Ground Soap refers to the origins of their chosen ingredients. From all-organic base oils, to creative and colorful packaging, from the first smell to the final rise, Ground Soap wants people to enjoy an experience that they have reason to feel good about all day.  Ground Soap's products are organic, biodegradable, paraben free, and free of synthetic scents and colours. Click here to learn more about Ground Soap. Boldly Humble (165 g) features t he sophisticated smell of anise with a hint of lavender. This soap is great for very oily and blemished skin. Anise oil has the aroma of black licorice and is a mild anti-parasitic. When used diligently is known to purify and balance skin but mostly this one's just about the smell. Ingredients:   organic olea europaea (olive) oil, organic cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, water (aqua), organic mangifera indica (mango) seed butter, butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit, theobroma organic cacao (cocoa) seed butter, pimpinella anisum (anise) fruit oil, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, alkanna tinctoria (alkanet) root powder, chamomilla recutita (chamomile) flower powder, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower powder, allantoin (plant derived).

title: Just the Goods vegan leave in volumizing and frizz-reducing hair conditioning spray

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan leave in volumizing and frizz-reducing hair conditioning spray

1.alt: Just the Goods vegan leave in volumizing and frizz-reducing hair conditioning spray

2.alt: Just the Goods vegan leave in volumizing and frizz-reducing hair conditioning spray - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Just the Goods' original leave in conditioning spray is a fantastic detangler, but if you're looking for more effective frizz reduction and a natural volume boost, then this is conditioner 2.0. Aloe detangles, lavender delivers bounce, jojoba and the tiniest bit of vegetable glycerine tame flyaways, and rosemary delivers shine. This product works by balancing the pH of freshly washed hair, rather than adding greasy oils to minimize the effects of harsh, chemical detergent-based shampoos. Interestingly, this product doubles as a styling product - when sprayed onto dry hair, it helps to keep flat ironed hair sleek and smooth. This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives. Please store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight for maximum longevity.
description.Ingredients: lavandula angustifolia (lavender/lavande) flower water, aloe barbadensis (aloe/aloé) leaf juice, deodorized simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, vegetable glycerine/ glycérine végétale, lavandula angustifolia (lavender/lavande) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary/rosmarin) oil
description.Directions: Spray into wet hair before styling with a hair dryer (approx 4-10 pumps depending on length of hair); add a little more before styling with a flat iron if desired; store in a cool, dark place; use within 6 months of opening.     Note: product does not resist re-frizzing after rain or showering; for best results, use after freshly washing hair     Vaporiser dans les cheveux humides avant de les coiffer au sèche-cheveux (appuyer 4 à 10 fois suivant la longueur des cheveux); en rajouter une petite quantité avant de se coiffer au fer à lisser selon vos préferences; garder à l'abri du chaud et de la lumière; utiliser dans les 6 mois suivant l'ouverture.     Note: Ce produit ne résiste pas à la pluie ni à la douche; pour en obtenir les meilleurs résultats se laver les cheveux juste avant l'emploi
description.Format: Available in 118 ml / 4 oz HDPE bottles with a spray top. One bottle lasts an average of 4 - 6 months depending on use. Save money and reduce waste on future purchases by re-using your spray top with the refill format.

title: just the goods extra rich vegan moisturizing lotion

0.alt: just the goods extra rich vegan moisturizing lotion

1.alt: just the goods extra rich vegan moisturizing lotion - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

2.alt: just the goods extra rich vegan moisturizing lotion - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Please note: No essential oils are added to this product for the sake of scent, so please be aware that this product smells like the ingredients from which it is made: olive oil, calendula oil, and argan oil. If you are not sure if this product is right for you, please purchase a 1 oz sample sized bottle to try it before committing to a larger bottle. And yes, you may add a few drops of an essential oil such as lavender or chamomile to customize the scent of this product if you wish, but please be aware that some essential oils may change to the capacity for this product to deliver as much moisture as it does (i.e. astringent oils are not recommended).  This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives. Please store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight for maximum longevity.
description.Ingredients: aqua (water/eau), argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil, olea europaea (olive) oil, calendula officinalis (calendula/souci) oil, aloe barbadensis (aloe) leaf gel, ethoxylated sorbitan ester (vegetable based emulsifying wax/cire émulsifiante végétale), vegetable glycerin/glycérine végétale, tocopherol (vitamin e - non GMO soy / vitamine e - soja sans OGM)
description.Format: This product is available in: 25 ml/1 oz hdpe bottles; 118 ml/4 oz hdpe bottles; 118 ml/4oz aluminum bottles with or without a pump; 235 ml/8oz hdpe bottles; 235 ml/8oz aluminum bottles with or without a pump; 235 ml/8 oz glass bottles with a pump Bottle pumps and other accessories can be found here: https://justthegoods.net/collections/accessories Please note: hand and body lotion is not available in 235 ml/8 oz glass bottles during the winter months because the water in this product can freeze, expand, and force enough pressure onto the glass that it shatters during transit. All cliches aside, Winnipeg *does* have a cold climate for a large part of the year, and that means this format is unavailable between mid-October to mid-April at my discretion. Thanks! Please note: HDPE plastic bottles may be discontinued at any time. Please note: Aluminum is thin and runs the risk of being dented either when shipped from the distributor to me, in the lab during production, or during shipping as a finished product. A dent in aluminum packaging is - at most - an aesthetic inconvenience in that it does not affect the quality or function of the product inside. The same is true for a beverage container - a dent that has not contributed to a leak does not impact the the product, which can still be consumed and enjoyed. Dents are therefore not considered product defects. For more information about this please visit:  https://www.instagram.com/p/B37nH80AbqE/

Size & Packaging: 8 oz / 235 ml Glass w pump (Summer only)

title: Just the Goods alcohol-free vegan mouthwash

0.alt: Just the Goods alcohol-free vegan mouthwash - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Just the Goods' vegan mouthwash has fast become a favourite, and hopefully you'll love it, too! Apart from the obvious highlights that this products contains no artificial colour/flavour, no sweeteners, no alcohol, no artificial preservatives, and no fluoride, let's take a look at what it does include and why.... Aloe vera gel juice is a natural anti-fungal and antibacterial, so it helps protect sensitive tissue in the mouth by controlling harmful bacteria, which furthermore assists in the fight against tooth decay. Aloe vera gel juice is also said to assist the body in the creation of collagen, which can help to strengthen weak and swollen gums. Alcohol-free witch hazel is known to help reduce pain and swelling, so it is beneficial for irritated or infected gums. Baking soda can be too abrasive for daily tooth brushing, but included as part of a rinse, it can help to control bad breath, discourage plaque, and assist in the healing of gums or other sores. This mouthwash also includes three essential oils: clove is commonly used in dental care around the world to disinfect the mouth, control harmful bacteria, and relieve pain; peppermint controls bacteria while also providing a pleasant taste and delivering fresh breath; myrrh encourages healthy tissue in that it can heal gums and some mouth ulcers. This item is available in 235 ml / 8 oz HDPE bottles or glass bottles (when the weather is warm enough to ensure the product won't freeze and shatter the glass).  This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.
description.Ingredients: aqua (water/eau distillée), aloe barbadensis (aloe) leaf juice, alcohol-free hammamelis virginiana (witch hazel) water/eau d'hamamélis virginiana sans alcool, sodium bicarbonate (baking soda/bicarbonate de soude), eugenia caryophyllus (clove/clou de girofle) flower oil, mentha piperita (peppermint/menthe poivrée) oil, commiphora myrrha (myrrh/myrrhe) oil
description.Directions: Use once or twice daily after brushing as you would any other commercial mouthwash.
description.Format: 235 ml / 8 oz HDPE or 235 ml / 8 oz glass. The 25 ml concentrated format has been discontinued due to widespread preference for the larger, blended variety

title: vegan eyeshadow by The All Natural Face in earl grey (matte)

description.main_description: The All Natural Face strives to provide the best mineral cosmetics possible without the use of any artificial ingredients. That means no bismuth, no talc, no carmine, no silk powder, no d & c lake colors, and no parabens, ever... just pure and simple ingredients from the earth. This is why Just the Goods trusts The All Natural Face and is thrilled to share this fantastic mineral makeup find! Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is richly pigmented for beautiful colour that blends flawlessly. A little goes a long way! But, for all day wear, consider using a priming base to hold your shades in place. A tiny dab of Just the Goods facial moisturizer on eyelids is enough to do the trick, but The All Natural Face's very own primer is also an option. Just the Goods does not currently carry this primer; however, it can become option with enough demand. Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is presented a small acrylic jar with a sifter seal to help prevent spills. Just the Goods carries 2 gram jars.

description.main_description: Urban Earth Teas offers organic, loose leaf, artisan teas made with certified organic ingredients, which are either certified fair trade, or bought directly from the growers whenever possible. Urban Earth Teas is proud to offer products that are as good for the earth as they are for the body. All blends are created by Doctor of Natural Medicine, Mara Jones, who has over 15 years of custom tea blending experience. She believes that teas should be as gorgeous as they are good for you. Urban Earth Teas is based in Powell River, British Columbia. Immunity is an immune stimulating blend that warms the body and buds. Sweet elderberries and cinnamon are balanced by spicy ginger, tangy rosehips and orange peel and earthy echinacea. Ingredients: echinacea root*, elderberries*, rosehips*, ginger root*, sweet cinnamon bark*†, orange peel* (*certified organic; †certified fair trade). Approximately 2 grams of tea makes for one wonderful cup/serving.

title: Urban Earth Teas blended organic herbal tea - Inspire

0.alt: Urban Earth Teas blended organic herbal tea - Inspire - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Named after the action "to breathe into", Inspire recognizes that taking deep breaths to calm and clear is a large part of focusing and grounding to undertake thoughtful work. This tea tastes sweet and green.
description.Ingredients: licorice root, anise seed, coltsfoot, violet leaf, red clover blossom, and hyssop.
description.Preparation: 1 tsp (2.1g)/cup, twice daily for a max of 6 weeks.  Avoid during pregnancy and while breastfeeding and in the case of liver disease.
description.Note: In Canada, Coltsfoot is considered to be safe to consume as long as the dose of pyrrolizidine alkaloids falls under the established recommended daily limits. Inspire tea falls well below those limits. For example, you would have to consume eight 100g bags of Inspire tea per kilogram of body weight per day to achieve the lowest levels of alkaloids that produced toxicity in documented testing [conducted historically] on animals. There have been no confirmed cases of Coltsfoot toxicity in humans.

title: Just the Goods vegan shaving soap for normal or sensitive skin

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan shaving soap for normal or sensitive skin

description.main_description: Razor burn and bumps, as well as itchy and flaking skin, can often be attributed to the harsh and pore clogging petrochemicals found in conventional shaving cream. A mild, moisturizing soap infused with the cleansing and healing benefits of essential oils is a fantastic way to achieve softer, smoother skin without irritation. Just the Good's vegan shaving soap gives a satisfying, clean shave that helps skin feel great thanks to vegetable-derived stearic acid and kaolin for slip and lather, essential oils that disinfect and provide antibacterial support, and shea butter moisturizes. Please note that those with highly sensitive skin and/or an allergy to botanicals may prefer the unscented version of this product.
description.Ingredients: SLS & propylene glycol-free melt & pour base [water, vegetable glycerine, sodium stearate, sodium oleate, sorbitol, stearic acid, lauric acid, sodium laurate, sodium myristate, pentasodium penteate, tetrasodium etidronate] with unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), kaolin clay, tocopherol (vitamin e - contains non-gmo soy) + essential oils (where applicable).
description.Directions: Shaving soaps are quite different than conventional shaving cream in a can.  As you know, cans use aerosol or other expellants to fill a petroleum base with gas and/or air to create a mousse. Just the Goods shaving solids, however, are made without sodium lauryl sulfate or other artificial foaming agents, so the trick to making them work is to use a shaving brush to create tiny bubbles. Brushes are sold separately.  To create lather, first saturate your brush with warm water then swirl it onto the shaving soap in fast and hard circles until tiny bubbles form. Next, using the brush, scoop up the bubbles and transfer them onto the area you wish to shave. A little goes a long way, so even the appearance of what is required is different than conventional shaving foam — all you need is a thin layer to help your razor glide.  Please note that if you try to rub the shaving soap directly onto the desired area, you won’t get enough bubbles to reduce the friction of your razor across your skin. A shaving brush is therefore required to whip up the soap, introducing air into the mixture, and creating the bubbles needed to do the job well.  When you’re finished shaving, tighten the lid of the the jar to prevent the soap from drying out and shrinking. The brush should be rinsed out and, ideally, hung upside down so water doesn’t sit in the base, which may case the adhesive holding the bristles in place to deteriorate. A clean, dry brush also means less bacterial growth, which means a fresher, healthier shave.
description.Format: Just the Goods shaving solids are poured directly into 125 ml / 4 oz reusable glass canning jars and offer a 65 g / 2.29 oz of soap.

description.Note: What's the difference between perfume and aromatherapeutic oils?   Aromatherapeutic oils are blended with emotionally supportive values in mind (i.e. "uplifiting" is can help to lift state of mind; "safety net" is comforting/reassuring, etc) whereas the perfume oils are blended with consideration for scent only so ther are not necessarily a unified aromatherapeutic benefit avaialble from the essential oils involved.

title: Just the Goods vegan unscented lotion with avocado oil + apricot kernel oil

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan unscented lotion with avocado oil + apricot kernel oil - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Ingredient highlights: Avocado oil is rich in vitamins A, D and E, as well as potassium, proteins, beta-carotene and numerous essential unsaturated fatty acids. It also contains a high quantity of sterolins, which is reported to help reduce age spots, help heal sun damage and scars. Avocado oil is furthermore said to increase the amount of collagen in the skin, which facilitates regeneration, particularly in the case of skin that is dehydrated or otherwise affected by difficult climates (i.e. Winnipeg’s dry winters). Some claim that avocado oil can even help to relieve the dryness and itching of psoriasis and eczema. Apricot kernel oil has a high content of vitamins A, C, and E, as well as fatty acids such as oleic and linoleic acid. It is considered gentle enough to be used in products for babies, and is thus also suitable for mature and sensitive skin. It is well absorbed without leaving a greasy feeling, and can be helpful in calming the discomfort associated with conditions such as eczema and dermatitis. Aloe vera gel is a powerful moisturizer that simultaneously helps to remove dead skin. It also stimulates the synthesis of collagen and elastin and is known to have a healing effect on burns and other wounds, all of which translates into assisting regeneration. Distilled water gives this lotion a smooth, fluid texture while ensuring a non-greasy finish, vegetable based emulsifying wax holds everything together, and vegetable glycerine provides staying power. This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives. Please store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight for maximum longevity. *** As noted above, this item involves the same formula used in the facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin, tattoo after care, hair smoothing lotion and as a general hand/body lotion that may benefit those with mild cases of eczema. These items are bottled with different names to better serve those looking for particular items. Customer feedback has also indicated that it helps to avoid confusion with the other facial moisturizers, which include a range of additional ingredients. ***
description.Ingredients: unscented vegan lotion with avocado oil + apricot kernel oil /    lotion végétalienne sans parfum avec huile de noyau d'abricot + avocat:   aqua (water/eau), persea gratissima (avocado/avocat) oil, prunus armeniaca (apricot/abricot) kernel oil, ethoxylated sorbitan ester (vegetable based emulsifying wax/cire émulsifiante végétale), aloe barbadensis (aloe/aloé) leaf gel, vegetable glycerine (glycérine végétale), tocopherol (vitamin e - non GMO soy/vitamine e - soja sans OGM)
description.Format: This product is available in: 25 ml/1 oz hdpe bottles; 118 ml/4 oz hdpe bottles; 118 ml/4oz aluminum bottles with or without a pump; 235 ml/8oz hdpe bottles; 235 ml/8oz aluminum bottles with or without a pump; 235 ml/8 oz glass bottles with a pump Bottle pumps and other accessories can be found here: https://justthegoods.net/collections/accessories Please note: hand and body lotion is not available in 235 ml/8 oz glass bottles during the winter months because the water in this product can freeze, expand, and force enough pressure onto the glass that it shatters during transit. All cliches aside, Winnipeg *does* have a cold climate for a large part of the year, and that means this format is unavailable between mid-October to mid-April at my discretion. Thanks! Please note: HDPE plastic bottles may be discontinued at any time. Please note: Aluminum is thin and runs the risk of being dented either when shipped from the distributor to me, in the lab during production, or during shipping as a finished product. A dent in aluminum packaging is - at most - an aesthetic inconvenience in that it does not affect the quality or function of the product inside. The same is true for a beverage container - a dent that has not contributed to a leak does not impact the the product, which can still be consumed and enjoyed. Dents are therefore not considered product defects. For more information about this please visit:   https://www.instagram.com/p/B37nH80AbqE/

Size & Packaging: 8 oz / 235 ml Glass w pump (Summer only)

title: Just the Goods vegan leave in hair conditioning spray

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan leave in hair conditioning spray

1.alt: Just the Goods vegan leave in hair conditioning spray - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

2.alt: Just the Goods vegan leave in hair conditioning spray - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Just the Goods' leave in conditioning spray requires little more than a few spritzes of moisturizing rose water and aloe vera juice to restore manageability to hair after washing with natural bar soap style shampoo bars, or any other variety of shampoo. Geranium bourbon also adds moisture while rosemary essential oil helps hair shine. This conditioner is a great de-tangler, as well! This product works by balancing the pH of freshly washed hair, rather than adding greasy oils to minimize the effects of harsh, chemical detergent-based shampoos. So, if you find that natural soap shampoo bars leave your hair feeling coated with some type of residue, be assured that your hair is clean... it just feels different and needs a bit of a boost. This is it! This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives. Please store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight for maximum longevity.
description.Ingredients: rosa damascena (rose) flower distillate, aloe barbadensis (aloe) leaf juice, pelargonium graveolens (geranium bourbon/géranium bourbon) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary/rosmarin) oil, tocopherol (vitamin e - non gmo soy/vitamine e - soja sans ogm)
description.Directions: shake well before use; spray throughout hair after shampooing (approx 4-10 pumps depending on length of hair); leave for 1 minute before combing and styling as usual; use within 6 months of opening    bien agiter avant l'emploi; appuyer 4 à 10 fois (suivant la longueur des cheveux) pour vaporiser sur les cheveux humides après le shampooing; laisser agir 1 minute avant de coiffer normalement; utiliser dans les 6 mois suivant l'ouverture
description.Format: Available in 118 ml / 4 oz HDPE bottles with a spray top. One bottle lasts an average of 4 - 6 months depending on use. Save money and reduce waste on future purchases by re-using your spray top with the refill format.

description.main_description: Designed with facial care for sensitive skin in mind, this product has become popular as an after sun lotion, or more “high end” body lotion. A lesser known secret is that it makes a fantastic smoothing lotion to help tame frizzy hair. This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives. Please store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight for maximum longevity. *** As noted above, this item involves the same formula used in the facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin, tattoo after care, after sun lotion, and as a general hand/body lotion that may benefit those with mild cases of eczema. These items are bottled with different names to better serve those looking for particular items. description.Directions: place a very small amount in your palm and rub hands together before sweeping palms over hair to lightly  cover fly-aways, weighing them down just enough to reduce the appearance of frizz. Start with less and add more as required to avoid over application.

description.main_description: This deep conditioning oil treatment for hair helps to prevent split ends, tame frizz, and encourage shine through a nourishing blend of vegetable-based oils. This product is EWG VERIFIED™. This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.
description.Ingredients: cocos nucifera (coconut/noix de coco) oil, ricinus communis (castor/ricin) seed oil, triticum vulgare (wheat/germe de blé ) germ oil, olea europaea (olive/ fruit d'olive) fruit, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, daucus carota sativa (carrot/graine de carotte) seed oil, d-limonene/d-limonène °    °component of essential oil/composant d'huile essentielle
description.Directions: Shake bottle and carefully pour into the palm of your hand then apply to the lengths of your hair. Avoid applying to your scalp as the oil is very thick and rich. You may also wish to avoid getting this product on your clothing by draping a towel over your shoulders and clipping your hair up when fully saturated. Let oil absorb into your hair for 20 minutes, then shampoo, condition and style as usual. This oil is very rich and may cause build up if used too frequently. Monthly use is suggested.
description.Format: Available in 25 ml / 1 oz HDPE bottles

title: vegan eyeshadow by The All Natural Face in metallic antique copper (shimmer)

0.alt: vegan eyeshadow by The All Natural Face in metallic antique copper (shimmer) - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: The All Natural Face strives to provide the best mineral cosmetics possible without the use of any artificial ingredients. That means no bismuth, no talc, no carmine, no silk powder, no d & c lake colors, and no parabens, ever... just pure and simple ingredients from the earth. This is why Just the Goods trusts The All Natural Face and is thrilled to share this fantastic mineral makeup find! Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is richly pigmented for beautiful colour that blends flawlessly. A little goes a long way! But, for all day wear, consider using a priming base to hold your shades in place. A tiny dab of Just the Goods facial moisturizer on eyelids is enough to do the trick, but The All Natural Face's very own primer is also an option. Just the Goods does not currently carry this primer; however, it can become option with enough demand. Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is presented a small acrylic jar with a sifter seal to help prevent spills. Just the Goods carries 2 gram jars.

title: Just the Goods vegan perfume oil gift set

description.main_description: Just the Goods' range of gender neutral perfume and aromatherapeutic oils are made with essential oils, absolutes, and attars that blend with the wearer's natural chemistry to create a personal scent that holds close to the body. Artificial laboratory concocted scents and chemical fixatives and/or preservatives are never included as they are associated with allergies among other health risks and thus simply do not meet Just the Goods' high standards. So now the question is, why pick only one? Choose from any three of the following as a gift to yourself or someone you adore! Fragrance Line: Energizing   eucalyptus twist   takes bright eucalyptus essential oil, splashes it with fresh and fruity lemon and lime essential oil, then delicately softens it with a touch of floral petitgrain, known for its ability to calm anger and relieve stress  << EWG VERIFIED™ Romantic   neroli + ylang ylang   is a love affair between two deeply smoldering florals -- breathe deeply and be transported to into something extraordinary   << EWG VERIFIED™ Delicious   playful , featuring vanilla and clove, is reminiscent fresh baking with a flirty twist   << EWG VERIFIED™ Spicy nights   is a sensual tryst involving the aphrodisiac effects of ylang ylang and cinnamon and the energetic freshness of sweet orange -- get seductive and have fun!   << EWG VERIFIED™ Softly floral   steamy dreamy   carries you into another world, a soft and romantic space between ethereal imagination and corporeal bliss   << EWG VERIFIED™ Warm and moody   wild woods   is a complicated blend of essential oils derived from exotic woods and smoky florals with a touch of sweet orange essential oil to put it all into context. Includes labdanum, rosewood, sandalwood, orange, patchouli and just a hint of rose, among others...   << EWG VERIFIED™ Arom atherapeutic line: Love and rage   offers a fresh blend of rosemary, lavender, peppermint, and ylang ylang essential oil with softening honeysuckle attar to stay calm, feel love, and change the world! Safety net   includes cardamom, jasmine, and mandarin essential oil  to helps calm stress and anger   << EWG VERIFIED™ Uplifting   inspires positivity through the warmly energetic scent of bergamot and the pleasantly soothing aromas of rosewood and geranium -- a quick yet gentle pick-me-up to help you carry on with your day.   << EWG VERIFIED™ *** Unsure which scents you'll enjoy most? Try samples first, available here:  https://justthegoods.net/products/sample-size-vegan-perfume-aromatherapeutic-oils-1 *** To protect the integrity and longevity of this handmade product created without artificial preservatives, please store in a cool, dark place as heat and sunlight will cause premature deterioration. Use within 6 months.

description.main_description: Bath melts are available in packages of six and come in the following varieties: calm melts: lavender and vetiver energizer i: basil and lemon energizer ii: bergamot, lavender, juniper and peppermint romantic: rosewood, patchouli, and ylang ylang sleepy: bergamot, clary sage and roman chamomile unscented These handcrafted items are made without artificial preservatives. They are sensitive to heat, but if they melt or are exposed to a bit of humidity before you have a chance to use them, no worries, they’re still okay! However, to keep smelling as best as possible and looking gorgeous, please store them tightly sealed in cool, dark place. Please note these items are susceptible to melting during transit, so please do keep this in mind if you’re choosing these for gift giving during the summer months and appearance is a consideration.
