5.alt: vegan tattoo collaboration with katakankabin and tattrx - postcard set and aftercare lotion - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Just the Goods is honoured to partner with vegan tattoo artist, katakankabin, and Morgan English of tattrx to bring you a limited edition set of three black ink postcards designed by katakankabin plus vegan tattoo aftercare lotion by Just the Goods featuring a custom drawn label. Designed with facial care for sensitive skin in mind, this nutritive, non-greasy product has become popular for the care and maintenance of new tattoos. Highlighted ingredients: Avocado oil is rich in vitamins A, D and E, as well as potassium, proteins, beta-carotene and numerous essential unsaturated fatty acids. It also contains a high quantity of sterolins, which is reported to help reduce age spots, help heal sun damage and scars. Avocado oil is furthermore said to increase the amount of collagen in the skin, which facilitates regeneration, particularly in the case of skin that is dehydrated or otherwise affected by difficult climates. Some claim that avocado oil can even help to relieve the dryness and itching of psoriasis and eczema. Apricot kernel oil has a high content of vitamins A, C, and E, as well as fatty acids such as oleic and linoleic acid. It is considered gentle enough to be used in products for babies, and is thus also suitable for mature and sensitive skin. It is well absorbed without leaving a greasy feeling, and can be helpful in calming the discomfort associated with conditions such as eczema and dermatitis. Aloe vera gel is a powerful moisturizer that simultaneously helps to remove dead skin. It also stimulates the synthesis of collagen and elastin and is known to have a healing effect on burns and other wounds, all of which translates into assisting regeneration. This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives. Please store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight for maximum longevity and please use within 6 months of opening. Artist biographies Katakankabin 's veganism is a refusal of animal exploitation. In addition to maintaining a strict vegan diet, she carefully avoids the use of any products and/or activities that contributes to the abuse, pain, or enslavement of other species. This goal means living -- as best as possible -- without reliance on materials such as leather, or attending zoos and/or circuses, etc. Applied to the field of tattooing, pursuing strict veganism involves excluding products containing animal by-products and/or products that have been tested on animals (i.e. inks, disinfectants, soap, lotion). It also involves ensuring the workplace is free of leather and non-vegan drawing materials. Katakankabin's arts-informed radical activism is diverse. In addition to being the author of several political satires, her studies in architecture in Montreal led her to becoming involved in student politics, as well as artistic journalism addressing the West Bank. Her current adventure started when she learned tattooing in Mexico three years ago. She has since worked in Montreal and New York and - now on the road - she books clients in cities worldwide. Find her in Panama (April 9 - 18), Puerto Rico (May 10 - 21), and Brazil (June - July). Katakankabin's work is largely identifiable through her use of abstract and figurative lines. For further information, please see: De peaux en aiguilles - Végane tattoos et féminisme, Les bêtes d'hier (2015). Morgan English created tattrx, a curated exploration of modern tattoo art, offering support to the modern tattoo community worldwide. Visit: http://shop.tattrx.com/
description.Format: 118 ml / 4 oz in an HDPE bottle. Reusable pumps sold separately.

title: The Green Beaver Company Coconut Moisturizing Conditioner

0.alt: The Green Beaver Company Coconut Moisturizing Conditioner - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Just the Goods has searched long and hard to find a healthier shampoo option that leaves hair feeling much like it does when using conventional products. But I had other strict criteria in mind, too. The brand needed to be: plant-based, vegan, certified cruelty-free, labelled with ingredient transparency in mind, independently owned, affordable, open to all genders, and it furthermore needed to *not* make gimmicky claims. Narrowing down beyond that, I purchased and tried oh-so-many products, but I was thrilled to discover something that was only one province away... The Green Beaver Company, based in Hawkesbury, Ontario! All products are Eco-Cert certified, certified vegan and cruelty-free by PETA and The Green Beaver Company has taken Environmental Defence's Just Beautiful pledge. From The Green Beaver Company's website: "If your hair needs some TLC, look no further than our all-natural ultra moisturizing coconut conditioner! This delicious tropical blend of bioactive and organic ingredients penetrates deep into the keratin fibers of your hair, leaving it beautiful, healthy and completely renewed! Great for tackling dry and brittle hair. Use with Coconut Moisturizing Shampoo for best results." Each bottle is 240 ml. Sample sizes of this item are, unfortunately, not produced by the manufacturer, The Green Beaver Company. F or hygienic reasons, please note that purchases of this item are considered final sale.  Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Aqua, Brassicyl Isoleucinate Esylate, Brassica Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera Oil*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sunflower Seed Oil Polyglyceryl-6 Esters, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Ester, Jojoba Ester, Natural Coconut Aroma, Cymbopogon Martinii (Palmarosa) Oil*, Sodium PCA, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Inulin, Borage Oil*, Ledum Groenlandicum Water*, Comptonia Peregrina Water*, Achillea Millefolium Extract*, Sodium Levulinate, Potassium Sorbate. Biodegradeable, gluten-free, certified cruelty free by PETA, gmo-free and vegan. . Beyond this, this product is free from alcohol, artifical fragrance, parabens, phenoxyethanol, phthalates or dyes, SLS or other synthetic detergents, soy, triclosan * Ingredients from organic farming 43.27% of the total ingredients are from natural origin. 99.7% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. Natural and Organic Cosmetics certified by ECOCERT Greenlife according to ECOCERT Standard available at http://cosmetics.ecocert.com

title: Urban Earth Teas + just the goods vegan facial steam for all skin types

0.alt: Urban Earth Teas + just the goods vegan facial steam for all skin types - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

1.alt: Urban Earth Teas + just the goods vegan facial steam for all skin types - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Urban Earth Teas offers organic, loose leaf, artisan teas made with certified organic ingredients, which are either certified fair trade, or bought directly from the growers whenever possible. Urban Earth Teas is proud to offer products that are as good for the earth as they are for the body. All blends are created by Doctor of Natural Medicine, Mara Jones, who has over 15 years of custom tea blending experience. She believes that teas should be as gorgeous as they are good for you. Urban Earth Teas is based in Powell River, British Columbia. Peace is both relaxing and uplifting thanks to a beautiful, floral blend that helps to battle the blues. An examination of the ingredients also reveals that: Chamomile softens skin, reduces puffiness, and gently moisturizes Lemon balm (a.k.a melissa) is anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, and anti-oxidant Borage heals dry/damaged skin Lavender is mildly antibacterial in ways that are especially beneficial for oily skin, but suitable for use with other skin types Rose gently moisturizes and softens skin Combined, this variety of flowers and herbs does a little of everything to support clean, glowing skin for all skin types. I asked Mara  for her thoughts on using this tea as a herbal facial steam for all skin types and, to my delight, she agreed that it would be a great way to enjoy this blend. This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.
description.Ingredients: matricaria recutita (chamomile/ camomille) petals*, melissa officinalis (lemon balm/mélisse) leaves*, borago officinalis (borage/bourrache) leaves*, lavandula angustifolia (lavender/ lavande) petals*, and rosa damascena (rose) petals*     *certified organic/certifié organique
description.Directions: steep 1 tbsp of tea in a covered bowl containing 2 cups of boiling water for 5 min while washing and drying face; uncover bowl and hold face above steam for 5 - 10 min; use a towel to create a tent if desired. Garder à l'abri de la lumière et du chaud

title: vegan eyeshadow by The All Natural Face in frosted blueberries (sparkle)

0.alt: vegan eyeshadow by The All Natural Face in frosted blueberries (sparkle) - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: The All Natural Face strives to provide the best mineral cosmetics possible without the use of any artificial ingredients. That means no bismuth, no talc, no carmine, no silk powder, no d & c lake colors, and no parabens, ever... just pure and simple ingredients from the earth. This is why Just the Goods trusts The All Natural Face and is thrilled to share this fantastic mineral makeup find! Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is richly pigmented for beautiful colour that blends flawlessly. A little goes a long way! But, for all day wear, consider using a priming base to hold your shades in place. A tiny dab of Just the Goods facial moisturizer on eyelids is enough to do the trick, but The All Natural Face's very own primer is also an option. Just the Goods does not currently carry this primer; however, it can become option with enough demand. Frosted blueberries is beautiful silvery blue, almost chrome like -- silver, grey, and blue all at once. This shade completely changes color with the use of a primer: used with a primer, it offers a silvery blue, flashing all sorts of metallic; without primer, you get a more grey/silver look. which is fabulous for creating a smoky eye. Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is presented a small acrylic jar with a sifter seal to help prevent spills. Just the Goods carries 2 gram jars.

title: Just the Goods vegan shaving soap - extra moisturizing

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan shaving soap - extra moisturizing

description.main_description: Razor burn and bumps, as well as itchy and flaking skin, can often be attributed to the harsh and pore clogging petro-chemicals found in conventional shaving cream. A mild, moisturizing soap infused with the cleansing and healing benefits of essential oils is a fantastic way to achieve softer, smoother skin without irritation. Just the Good's vegan shaving soap gives a satisfying, clean shave that helps skin feel great thanks to vegetable-derived stearic acid and kaolin for slip and lather, essential oils that disinfect and provide antibacterial support, and avocado oil and shea butter ensuring rich moisture. Beyond this, avocado oil is known to be regenerative and rejuvenating due to its high quantity of sterolins, which are reputed to reduce age spots and help heal sun damage and scars. In the scented version, lavender and bergamot provide additional benefit in that both oils are antiseptic and lavender is furthermore known as a bactericide while bergamot features antibiotic properties. This combination smells fantastic and both oils are great for lifting spirits and combating depression. While mild, it is still recommended that those with highly sensitive skin and/or an allergy to botanicals opt for the unscented version of this product instead.
description.Ingredients: SLS & propylene glycol-free melt & pour base [water, vegetable glycerine, sodium stearate, sodium oleate, sorbitol, stearic acid, lauric acid, sodium laurate, sodium myristate, pentasodium penteate, tetrasodium etidronate] with unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), persea gratissima (avocado) oil, kaolin clay, tocopherol (vitamin e - contains non gmo soy) + essential oils where applicable
description.Directions: Shaving soaps are quite different than conventional shaving cream in a can.  As you know, cans use aerosol or other expellants to fill a petroleum base with gas and/or air to create a mousse. Just the Goods shaving solids, however, are made without sodium lauryl sulfate or other artificial foaming agents, so the trick to making them work is to use a shaving brush to create tiny bubbles. Brushes are sold separately.  To create lather, first saturate your brush with warm water then swirl it onto the shaving soap in fast and hard circles until tiny bubbles form. Next, using the brush, scoop up the bubbles and transfer them onto the area you wish to shave. A little goes a long way, so even the appearance of what is required is different than conventional shaving foam — all you need is a thin layer to help your razor glide.  Please note that if you try to rub the shaving soap directly onto the desired area, you won’t get enough bubbles to reduce the friction of your razor across your skin. A shaving brush is therefore required to whip up the soap, introducing air into the mixture, and creating the bubbles needed to do the job well.  When you’re finished shaving, tighten the lid of the the jar to prevent the soap from drying out and shrinking. The brush should be rinsed out and, ideally, hung upside down so water doesn’t sit in the base, which may case the adhesive holding the bristles in place to deteriorate. A clean, dry brush also means less bacterial growth, which means a fresher, healthier shave.
description.Format: Just the Goods shaving solids are poured directly into 125 ml / 4 oz reusable glass canning jars and offer a 65 g / 2.29 oz of soap.

title: vegan aloe vera gel juice

description.main_description: Please note, this product is not available due to a global shortage of aloe vera raw material and there is no re-stock ETA. Thank you. Aloe vera is well respected for its application as a moisturizing agent and can be found in a wide array of cosmetics and skin care applications.. It contains vitamin B complex, folic acid, vitamin C and carotene (a precursor of vitamin A). This aloe vera gel juice is a thin liquid that is safe for direct application to the skin, but should not be confused with a gel. This item is can easily spoil and become contaminated with microorganisms if not properly stored and used in combination other ingredients that offer antibacterial support.  It has a shelf-life of 1 year, but please keep this product refrigerated for best results. INCI Name: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice CAS #: 85507-69-3 County of Origin: Canada

title: Mother Earth Essentials Hand-poured Soy Candle - Cedar & Balsam

0.alt: Mother Earth Essentials Hand-poured Soy Candle - Cedar & Balsam

description.main_description: Mother Earth Essentials aromatherapeutic soy candles add a touch of light and a calming serenity to any occasion. Make your living space fresh & fragrant with 4 delightful scent blends. Each 150 g hand-poured GMO-free soy candle comes in a convenient travel tin with lid. Advantages of soy wax include: Soy wax is all-natural & environmentally friendly as it is not made from petroleum like paraffin wax. Soy candles last 50 % longer than paraffin candles. Soy candle spills are easy to clean - It's very difficult to remove paraffin. Cedar is one of the four sacred plants given to Aboriginal people and represents the western direction of the Medicine Wheel. Canadians from coast to coast know the spicy, resinous fragrance of cedar, traditionally known as a calming & grounding plant. Cedar is nature’s purifier and boasts a distinctly resinous fragrance. Leaves are cleaned from the stems and separated into small pieces to be used in many ways (for making tea, bathing and ceremony). It represents grounding, maturity, purification and balance. Elders suggest walking with cedar in your shoes to walk in a good way down your path and it was one of the first gifts of natural healing shared with settlers upon their arrival (its high vitamin C content was a great antidote for scurvy). It is the western direction of the medicine wheel. Mother Earth Essentials' Packaging All of Mother Earth Essentials' products are biodegradable and not harmful to the environment. They print their labels on recycled paper, and pack their shipments with recycled paper & reuse boxes. Mother Earth Essentials' Deepest Thanks All recognition for any success experienced at Mother Earth Essentials is given to the Creator, Mother Earth, & aboriginal Elders & medicine people who have demonstrated determination & resiliency in keeping their beautiful culture intact for future generations. Thank you for supporting Mother Earth Essentials.

description.main_description: Many producers of artificially scented room freshening products insist you use the spray away from your body to minimize inhalation and/or contact with skin. If a product isn’t safe enough to touch your body, why use it at all? And, why have separate products for body and environment? If it’s safe for one, it should be safe for the other. Just the Goods’ deliciously refreshing range of uplifting natural fragrances created using only essential oils is perfectly suitable for both your skin and your surroundings. For a light splash of scent and the aromatherapeutic benefits of various herbal, floral, fruit and spice derived essential oils , spritz as much or as little of this product on your body or into the air as desired. Fragrance options include: lemongrass pink grapefruit + clove lavender + peppermint zoom zoom: rosemary,  juniper, and peppermint eucalyptus twist: eucalyptus, lemon, lime, petitgrain spicy nights: sweet orange, cinnamon, ylang ylang This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.

title: Just the Goods vegan daily makeup brush cleaner

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan daily makeup brush cleaner

1.alt: Just the Goods vegan daily makeup brush cleaner - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: You’ve made the switch to healthy, mineral based colour cosmetics, so cleaning your makeup brushes without toxic solvents is the next step, naturally. Most commercial daily brush cleaners contain isopropyl alcohol, ethyl alcohol, acetone, propylene glycol and/or artificial fragrance to mask the harsh scent of those nasty petrochemicals. Just the Goods’ makeup brush cleanser features the disinfecting benefits of alcohol-free witch hazel and tea tree oil, as well as a small amount of olive oil to gently condition bristles to prevent breakage and/or fluffy stray ends. This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.
description.Ingredients: alcohol-free hammamelis virginiana (witch hazel) water, olea europaea (olive) fruit, melaleuca alternafolia (tea tree) leaf oil
description.Directions: This product is intended for daily use. Shake bottle well before spraying brush with cleanser, let soak for one minute, brush against a sheet of paper towel, and repeat until no more makeup transfers to the paper towel. When the brush is clean, gently pat it with a towel to remove excess liquid, then lay it flat on a towel and allow it to dry completely before using it again.
description.Format: 118 ml / 4 oz; 235 ml / 8 oz

title: vegan eyeshadow by The All Natural Face in subdued (shimmer)

description.main_description: The All Natural Face strives to provide the best mineral cosmetics possible without the use of any artificial ingredients. That means no bismuth, no talc, no carmine, no silk powder, no d & c lake colors, and no parabens, ever... just pure and simple ingredients from the earth. This is why Just the Goods trusts The All Natural Face and is thrilled to share this fantastic mineral makeup find! Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is richly pigmented for beautiful colour that blends flawlessly. A little goes a long way! But, for all day wear, consider using a priming base to hold your shades in place. A tiny dab of Just the Goods facial moisturizer on eyelids is enough to do the trick, but The All Natural Face's very own primer is also an option. Just the Goods does not currently carry this primer; however, it can become option with enough demand. Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is presented a small acrylic jar with a sifter seal to help prevent spills. Just the Goods carries 2 gram jars.

That means no bismuth, no talc, no carmine, no silk powder, no d & c lake colors, and no parabens, ever... just pure and simple ingredients from the earth. This is why Just the Goods trusts The All Natural Face and is thrilled to share this fantastic mineral makeup find! Vegan powder mineral eyeshadow by the All Natural Face is richly pigmented for beautiful colour that blends flawlessly. A little goes a long way! But, for all day wear, consider using a priming base to hold your shades in place. A tiny dab of Just the Goods facial moisturizer for normal/sensitive skin on eyelids is often enough to do the trick, but The All Natural Face's very own primer is also an option to facilitate blending for a muted, polished look. Just the Goods carries 5 gram jars.

title: Just the Goods vegan deodorizing foot scrub

0.alt: Just the Goods vegan deodorizing foot scrub

1.alt: Just the Goods vegan deodorizing foot scrub - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: This invigorating and deodorizing foot scrub tingles and tantalizes while bringing your tired feet back to life after a long day. Finely ground apricot kernel shell provides effective exfoliation while aloe vera and vegetable glycerine provide moisturizing slip. Peppermint essential oil stimulates and tea tree oil offers a reliable clean. This product was launched on Winnipeg’s Breakfast Television on September 14, 2011. To check out video documentation, click here: http://video.citytv.com/video/detail/1159238057001.000000/just-the-goods-foot-scrub/
description.Ingredients: aloe barbadensis (aloe) leaf gel, vegetable glycerine/glycérine végétale, prunus armeniaca (apricot/abricot) shell, mentha piperita (peppermint/menthe poivrée) oil, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree/arbre à thé) oil
description.Directions: To use, pour a dime sized amount into your hand and vigorously rub one foot at a time. Rinse well, pat dry, and apply a moisturizer — preferably Just the Goods’ nut-free peppermint ginger foot butter, or any other JTG body butter — and relax while your feet relish in refreshing comfort.
description.Format: One 1 oz bottle (40 g) will last approximately 6 treatments.

title: Ground Soap - Plain Jane

0.alt: Ground Soap - Plain Jane - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

1.alt: Ground Soap - Plain Jane - just the goods handmade vegan crueltyfree nontoxic skincare

description.main_description: Ground Soap -- based in Cornwall (Ontario) -- is dedicated to creating unique hand made bars of soap using only organic and wild crafted ingredients. Ground Soap's goal is to provide people with products that are both healthy for body and mind and leave as small a footprint on our planet as possible. The "Ground" in Ground Soap refers to the origins of their chosen ingredients. From all-organic base oils, to creative and colorful packaging, from the first smell to the final rise, Ground Soap wants people to enjoy an experience that they have reason to feel good about all day.  Ground Soap's products are organic, biodegradable, paraben free, and free of synthetic scents and colours. Click here to learn more about Ground Soap. Plain Jane (165 g)  is great for people who have allergies or are sensitive to scent from essential oils. It can be used safely on babies but is not tear free. Plain Jane works great as a shampoo bar for normal hair under average circumstances, this bar works very well with Just the Goods' leave in conditioning spray to help freshly washed hair maintain a familiar, easy to manage to texture. A great way to reduce your exposure to unhealthy chemicals in basic body care.
description.Ingredients: organic olea europaea (olive) oil, organic cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, water (aqua), organic mangifera indica (mango) seed butter, butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit, theobroma organic cacao (cocoa) seed butter, chamomilla recutita (chamomile) flower powder, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower powder, allantoin
description.Directions: Place shampoo bar briefly under running warm water. Create lather in by rubbing bar in hands and use lather to wash hair, focusing on scalp. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow with Just the Goods’ leave in conditioning spray, if desired. Note: A little goes a long way, so don’t use too much — the less you use, the easier it is to rinse out and the longer it will last. Pat bar dry and store in a dry location to obtain longest possible use.

Click here to learn more about Ground Soap. Medicine Man (165 g) All skin types can benefit from this gentle giant. Tea tree is a powerhouse essential oil used for its antiseptic, disinfectant and antifungal healing properties. Rhassoul clay is harvested from deep within the mountains of Morocco and gently extracts impurities from the skin while it exfoliates. Great for acne, eczema and itchy skin. Medicine Man works great as a shampoo bar for normal to oily hair under average circumstances, this bar works very well with Just the Goods’ leave in conditioning spray to help freshly washed hair maintain a familiar, easy to manage to texture. A great way to reduce your exposure to unhealthy chemicals in basic body care.

description.Directions: Place shampoo bar briefly under running warm water. Create lather in by rubbing bar in hands and use lather to wash hair, focusing on scalp. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow with Just the Goods’ leave in conditioning spray, if desired.
